New Records: Yuki Kawamura became the fourth Japanese-born player to score in an NBA game
Key Match Events: Yuki Kawamura tallied his first NBA points at the free throw line
Post-Match Reflections: Ja Morant had a great reaction to Yuki Kawamura's first NBA points
Miscellaneous Highlights: Yuki Kawamura is a major fan favorite, and his fanbase has followed him to the NBA
Others: Yuki Kawamura's first four field goal attempts were all misses before he scored at the free throw line
